means: 加拉加斯（委内瑞拉首都）

sentence.Network_en: Leaders of eight Latin American countries are meeting in Caracas, Venezuela, today.
sentence.Network_cn: 拉美8个国家的领导人今天在委内瑞拉的加拉加斯会晤。

sentence.Network_en: As we entered Caracas, a barrage of rocks flew toward us.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我们进入加拉斯时,石块接二连三地朝我们扔来.

sentence.Network_en: Caracas food distributor Santiago Alvarez complains that government bureaucrats are unhelpful.
sentence.Network_cn: 加拉加斯的食品分配到SantiagoAlvarez抱怨政府的官僚体制是无帮助的.
